notes.scm:Note: Add a themed pagination component
Include forms and tables css rules in global css.
Hide bullets for field grid in .magnum-dialog
Split out the forms and tables css rules so they can be used independently of the standard theme.
In standard page types, replace xxxTitleX property with xxxTitle that uses a MessageFormat. Make title display in-page optional.
added User.forId method
Convert the system embedded app styling to fit the standard theme
Improve the button styling in the standard theme
Tighten up the "standard" theme css styles
Enhance the system subapp to provide a basic view of the data subsystem (work in progress)
Provide an extension point for customization of the myAccount main menu.
Make sure the Controller filter runs for error requests so pages invoked as error handlers can contain full functionality.
Add an overridable doclet for code that goes in the head section of all pages.
Parameterize the css class name of the nav list UL tag
Add customization point for registration form.
Fix layout issues when mixing data divs and controls on same line of an sc-labeled-control-flow
Generic failure page for "verified email address required" security check.
Generic admin functionality refresh pass 2, customization hooks, crumbtrails
Generic admin functionality refresh pass 1
Add email verification and related UX changes to "myAccount" function and the auth menu
Fix regression in system app and change password function
Clean up registration UI and flow
Add a labeled-control-flow css class to create a standard multi-line flowing form control format
Standardize some basic visual architecture elements
Fixes and enhancements to system session search - join sessions with logins
Fix nav computation for selected path
Make system nav paths absolute to survive variations in root path config.
Sync up standard and system UI styling
Display LogEvent detail for session viewer
Clean up css, add navigation bar, add search and view of logged sessions in analytics module
Added basic high level analytics logging mechanism
Provide a minimal Session data object and init the admin user so app can be functional out of the box.
Fix bad reference to comp:main-page instead of theme:main-page
Create a standard theme and default set of components for out-of-the-box functionality
Change a login password as a system user, shell usability improvements
System user management, shell
Refactor base schema to separate app user from system user.
Edit system user profile (email address)
System console UI visual enhancements
inProcess flag for SMTP queue failsafe to prevent repeated resending of messages when encountering an exception post-send.
Add SMTP queue processing task to default PlaceContext
Third pass system console
Second pass system console
Initial sysadmin app
Include stubbed "components" package used to access servlet components library
Use context://code/ prefix to refer to jsclient library
Switch to XA datasource for embedded HSQLDB
Add auth tickets to standard schema.
Associate label "for" attribute with input control
Add struct field for email verification
Add css class to button bar
Move to reliable SMTP queueing system for in-app messages.
Layout component inner definitions now use a standard namespace context://code/layout
Make sure the navBar element associated with an absolute path is selected whenever the navContext absolute selected path starts with the element's absolute path.
Give the admin dir a default PathContext and hook up the NavFilter for a default menu
Move SmtpConnector to prefilters because Place may depend on it.
Move user accessible paths like upload dir to exportMounts
Provide for UIServlet and FileServlet direct configuration
Added a SqlStore and XmlStore to to simplify extensions
Add a logoutLink component
Use concrete path for Store base so Place is mountable outside web app.
Move filter definitions into war-webui/config
Name the WebApp schema "spiralcraft-webapp" so the data goes in the right place
Fix missing xmlns
Move base webapp configuration to war-webui/config and war-webui/config/base
Provide for app-level overrides of key configuration assemblies.
Standardize on embedded HSQLDB for identity data model, allow for override at app level
Provide "myAccount" page to change password linked to from top bar.
Add configuration assemblies so that app can be run with a default minimal configuration.
Move to standardized namespace usage
Change password functionality
Hide auth menu in login page
Redirect after logout
Change self-references to bundle references
Enhancements for embedded-mode operation
Fix deprecated named struct constructs
context://theme/ will expose functional directories as well in war-webui/function to provide a unified customization model
Move non-modifiable configuration into war-webui
Refactor Registration function to use theming system
Fix registration page
Refactor themes/basic to themes/default and integrate new Page model and theming api
Reflect upgraded integration mechanism for WebUI and make webapp a functional application base.
Update security constraints to reflect new location for login and register page
Clean up navigation path logic to account for default resources (URI points to a container)
Migrate some standard top level request processing into "context://code" tree such as login.webui and register.webui
page.tgl has a hook for custom css (dynamic:/spiralcraft/webapp/custom-css)
Provide data-based view resolution (incomplete)
Move to extension-less (no .webui) URI paths using the UIServlet as the default servlet, permitting any static resource to be served by a dynamic .webui file.
Add random password generator to registration context
Add base server Context.assy.xml
Add css classes for data tables
Add standard set of Admin nav paths
Add identity role mapping data support
Add config differentiated SMTP service to global config
Support multiple types of forms for each function
Support additional contexts for editing registration data and passwords.
Promoted NavContext mechanism to the component level in spiralcraft-core.
Rename NavigationContext to NavContext
Data driven nav model
Minimalist nav tab layout
Development of basic theme
Formalization of css selector naming
